name: 4.3 "Someday My Prince Will Come" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why did Diane tell the customers at her table she worked at Cheers?
options: She couldn't get a better job.
She is in love with Sam.
questions.explanation:
She's researching a novel.

	When everyone in the bar did the wave, she stood up and did the wave as well. She explained to the customers that she had to go with it or they others would get angry. So the next time they did the wave, the couple at her table joined in.

questions.text: Who has a science experiment for school?
questions.explanation:
Gino.

	Gino was Carla's son with Nick. He was her 3rd oldest. She asked Diane to help but Diane said she wouldn't do Gino's work.

questions.text: Who did Woody say is really smart?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Clavin

	Woody said, "Mr. Clavin has more brains in his whole body than I have in my little finger." Cliff told him he had it backwards. Woody saw this as more proof of how smart Cliff Clavin was.

questions.text: What did Diane say you can learn a lot from?
questions.explanation:
a person's coat.

	A man had left his coat on the bar at Cheers. Diane started to speculate what the man was like based on his coat.

questions.text: Who did Diane say her favorite uncle was when she was a child?
questions.explanation:
Uncle Jack.

	She was telling Sam about her uncle when she was little. And she said her uncle would say "Who's your favorite uncle?" And she would squeal, "Uncle Jack, Uncle Jack!".

questions.text: What did Diane imagine about the man who left his coat?
questions.correct: that he had a car phone
options: that he's got his own plane
questions.explanation:
that he had a car phone.

	Diane told the man she imagined this when she talked to him on the phone. She found out that he did indeed have a car phone.

questions.text: Who was the man who owned the coat?
questions.explanation:
Stuart.

	Stuart was played by Frank Dent. He is best known for his role as Mr. Egg in "Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead".

questions.text: What did the coat man do for a living?
questions.explanation:
an architect.

	He said he was an architect. Then Diane said, "An architect. Did you hear that Sam, an architect?" Sam replied, "Three times."

questions.text: What did Sam say the man with the coat could do?
questions.correct: Make a clock stop by looking at it.
options: Make a rabbit appear out of a hat
Make smoke rings with cigarette smoke
questions.explanation:
Make a clock stop by looking at it.

	Sam made this comment regarding Stuart's looks. Woody however did not get this and  really believed Stuart has the power to stop a clock by looking at it. He asked Diane if Stuart would do it for him. Diane gets upset with Sam for the comment. Sam said to Woody, "Wasn't that supposed to be between you, me and the post."

questions.text: What lie did Sam tell Diane to tell the man with the coat?
questions.correct: You have a contagious skin disease and insanity runs in the family.
options: You have a rare blood disorder and like to eat cotton.
questions.explanation:
You have a contagious skin disease and insanity runs in the family.

	Diane asked Sam for help for breaking up with Stuart because she wasn't attracted to him. When Sam tells her to use this lie she gets angry and decides to tell him the truth. However, when she went to tell him she was not attracted to him, he started talking about making changes in his life and she ended up using Sam's lie.
